overview: Cees Janssen (1962) has been a director of NAVITAS Capital since 1 January 2006. Between 1997 and 2005, he was a director of BDO Corporate Finance and a partner in BDO in the Netherlands. At BDO, Cees had responsibility for the valuation practice and was also involved in mergers and acquisitions, management buy-outs and financing issues. He started his career as a credit adviser in the Non-Performing Accounts Department of Bank Mees & Hope. Cees is a registeraccountant and registervaluator. Since 2006, he has been a supervisory director of Kinderopvang Nederland B.V.
